Piece
description: Class representing a generic chess piece.

name: constructor
description: Create a Piece in the given position.

params.name: algebraicPosition
params.description: The position of the piece in algebraic notation.

name: algebraicPosition
description: The algebraic position of the piece.

name: coordinates
description: The coordinates of the piece.

name: rules
description:
This field defines the overall rules for the movement of a piece,
override it on the specific piece class with the piece rule.

unknown.tagValue: The rules for the piece movement.

name: validateAlgebraicNotation
description: Validates if a position is in algebraic notation.

params.name: algebraicPosition
params.description: The position of the piece in algebraic notation.

throws.description:
Throws a BadRequestError if the given algebraicPosition
is invalid.

name: fromAlgebraic
description: Converts from algebric notation to coordinates.

unknown.tagValue: {Coordinates} An array in the form [column, row]

params.name: algebraicPosition
params.description: The position of the piece in algebraic notation.

return.description: An array in the form [column, row]

name: toAlgebraic
description: Converts from coordinates to algebric notation.

unknown.tagValue: {AlgebraicNotation} The position of the piece in algebraic notation.

return.description: The position of the piece in algebraic notation.

name: isLegalPosition
description: Checks if a given position is valid or not.

unknown.tagValue: {Boolean} Whether or not the given position is legal.

return.description: Whether or not the given position is legal.

name: possiblePositions
description: All the possible (legal) movements of a piece.

unknown.tagValue:
{Coordinates[]} - Every possible coordinates that the piece can reach,
it includes coordinates out of the board.

return.description:
Every possible coordinates that the piece can reach,
it includes coordinates out of the board.

name: possiblePositionsInNMoves
description: All the possible (legal) movements of a piece after n moves.

unknown.tagValue:
{AlgebraicNotation[]} Every possible coordinates that the piece can reach,
it includes coordinates out of the board.

params.name: movesInfo.startAt
params.description:
Starting position of the
piece. Defaults to the position of the current piece.

params.name: movesInfo.positions
params.description: Array of positions. Used for recursion.

return.description:
Every possible coordinates that the piece can reach,
it includes coordinates out of the board.

throws.description: Throws a BadRequestError if the given n is invalid.

name: src/index.js

content:
# Valid chess moves

[![License: GPL v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-GPL%20v3-blue.svg)](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0)
[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/martini97/valid-chess-moves/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/martini97/valid-chess-moves?branch=master)
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/martini97/valid-chess-moves.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/martini97/valid-chess-moves)
[![PRs Welcome](https://img.shields.io/badge/PRs-welcome-brightgreen.svg)](/CONTRIBUTING.md)

## Running loccaly
```bash
$ git clone https://github.com/martini97/valid-chess-moves.git
$ cd valid-chess-moves
$ yarn
$ yarn start
```

## Documentation
This project is currently using jsdoc for documentation, you can check it [here](https://martini97.github.io/valid-chess-moves/).
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "valid-chess-moves",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "description": "Calculates all the possible positions that a chess Knight can take in exactly two moves.",
  "repository": "https://github.com/martini97/valid-chess-moves",
  "author": "Alessandro Martini <alessandrofmartini@gmail.com>",
  "license": "GPL-3.0-only",
  "private": false,
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "nodemon server.js",
    "docs:clean": "[ ! -e docs ] || rm -rf docs",
    "docs:build": "esdoc",
    "docs": "yarn run docs:clean && yarn run docs:build",
    "heroku:deploy": "cd src/client && yarn install && yarn build",
    "test:coverage": "jest --coverage --coverageReporters=text-lcov --testPathIgnorePatterns src/client | coveralls",
    "test:watch": "NODE_ENV=test jest --watch --testPathIgnorePatterns src/client",
    "test": "NODE_ENV=test jest --testPathIgnorePatterns src/client"
  },
  "husky": {
    "hooks": {
      "pre-commit": "yarn test",
      "pre-push": "yarn test"
    }
  },
  "jest": {
    "projects": [
      {
        "runner": "jest-runner-eslint",
        "displayName": "lint",
        "testMatch": [
          "<rootDir>/src/**/*.js"
        ]
      },
      {
        "displayName": "test"
      }
    ]
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.3",
    "babel-plugin-root-import": "^6.1.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-export-extensions": "^6.22.0",
    "babel-polyfill": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.7.0",
    "express": "^4.16.3",
    "meaning-error": "^2.3.0",
    "meaning-error-middleware": "^0.1.1",
    "morgan": "^1.9.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-eslint": "8",
    "babel-jest": "^23.4.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-class-properties": "^6.24.1",
    "coveralls": "^3.0.2",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.19.1",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^17.0.0",
    "eslint-import-resolver-babel-plugin-root-import": "^1.1.1",
    "eslint-plugin-babel": "^5.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.12.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.0.3",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.9.1",
    "husky": "^1.0.0-rc.13",
    "jest": "^23.4.0",
    "jest-runner-eslint": "^0.6.0",
    "jsdoc": "~3.5.5",
    "nodemon": "^1.18.1",
    "regenerator-runtime": "^0.12.0",
    "supertest": "^3.1.0"
  }
}
